text: Arthur Bullock (7 October 1909 – 1997) was an English professional footballer who played as an outside forward in the Football League for Hull City and York City, and in non-League football for Bridlington Town. He was capped two times by England schools in 1924. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:Sportspeople from Kingston upon Hull Category:Footballers from the East Riding of Yorkshire Category:1997 deaths Category:English footballers Category:England schools international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Bridlington Town A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Date of death missing
title: Arthur Bullock
